description: This file defines a React component called OAuthPanel used for handling OAuth 2.0 authentication flows for Jira and Confluence services. It includes UI elements, state management, and interactions with authentication context functions.

methods.name: OAuthPanel
methods.description: React functional component rendering OAuth login UI for Jira and Confluence, managing loading state, and invoking authentication methods.

methods.name: handleOAuthConnect
methods.description: Handles the OAuth connection click event, initiates login process, manages loading state, and calls success/error callbacks.
